heading: God (Islam). Name. Prayers and devotions.
general-note: Here are entered prayers and devotions using the names of God mainly as an inspirational device or focal point for worship. General works on the various terms for God, including the 99 Most Beautiful Names of God, are entered under. God (Islam)--Name.. Works on the attributes of God, including works on the theological meaning of the names of God as characteristics of God, are entered under. God (Islam)--Attributes..
